ISSUE.TITLE: Custom customer attributes not exported to Excel or XML
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Custom customer attributes does not seem to be exported to Excel or XML when choosing to export a customers information. Especially custom customer information can be value when finding out more about your customers - like how they found you on the net in the first place. Bug was found in v.3.30. How to replicate: 1) Create a custom customer attribute, like a tekstbox 2) Enter the information in your account 3) Export your customer to excel 4) Notice that your custom field information is not exported. ![example](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/16681184/12414984/25d88a22-beaa-11e5-8ada-bb57ceac1666.png)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #835 Added export custom customer attributes to Excel and XML
